reviews.review: Здесь ты, тупой долбаеб, и нет это не обращение. Хоть так и будут обращаться к тебе.

Игра конечно хорошая. Но без прайма игарть не возможно.
das wahrscheinlich beste competitive-Spiel auf dem Markt!

Epic game full of fun and challenging moments, has a bit of a learning curve but is extremely fun to learn and play with friends i recommend to play tiny bit of casual and jump right in to comp youll have a blast get bullied and hit awesome shots and have a real fun time, plus its free, like download it seriously!!
This is one of my favorite games of all time
After 5 Years not playing this game, it's time to play CS GO Again. and it's fun to play
recomend to all this game is awesome

There is a much more strategic and team oriented experience with CSGO versus other shooters. The high skill lvl and replayability keeps the game interesting. The only issue I have is the smerf and hackers that you will find. VAC sucks at determining hackers and many are able to hide cheats really well.
muito bom, melhor fps pvp é claro.
most toxic 800 hrs of my life, meet some long lasting friends. i hate this game, i play it so much.
